name: MISONR BCS Section 04 ETE
description: OAS0020 v1.0 Report to show BCS Section 4 answers for the selected establishment.

dataset.name: MIS Sentence
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, INITIALS, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, SURNAME || ', ' || INITIALS AS V_OFFENDER_SURNAME, CASE WHEN IN_EDUCATION = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_IN_EDUCATION, CASE WHEN SPECIAL_SCHOOL = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_SPECIAL_SCHOOL, CASE WHEN UNDERSTAND_ENGLISH_EASY = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_UNDERSTAND_ENGLISH_EASY, CASE WHEN READ_ENGLISH_EASY = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_READ_ENGLISH_EASY, CASE WHEN WRITE_ENGLISH_EASY = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_WRITE_ENGLISH_EASY, CASE WHEN SPEAK_ENGLISH_EASY = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_SPEAK_ENGLISH_EASY, CASE WHEN HELP_TO_WORK = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_HELP_TO_WORK, CASE WHEN S4_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: S4 ETE
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.RECEPTION_DATE, BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.IN_EDUCATION, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.EASY_READ_WRITE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.LEARNING_DIFFICULTY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.SPECIAL_SCHOOL, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.UNDERSTAND_ENGLISH_EASY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.READ_ENGLISH_EASY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.WRITE_ENGLISH_EASY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.SPEAK_ENGLISH_EASY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.MATHS_EASY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.HELP_TO_WORK, WORKING_BEFORE_CUSTODY.DESCRIPTION AS WORKING_BEFORE_CUSTODY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.HELP_KEEPING_JOB, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.WORK_PROGRAMME, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.S4_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.S4MC FROM ASSESSMENT, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID, BCS_PART_STATUS, OFFENDER, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4, WORKING_BEFORE_CUSTODY, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY, PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON WHERE (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = ASSESSMENT.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID AND ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_TYPE_ELM = 'TR_BCS') AND (PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PURPOSE) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.ASSESSMENT_ID) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION4.WORKING_BEFORE_CUSTODY = WORKING_BEFORE_CUSTODY.WORKING_BEFORE_CUSTODY_CODE (+)) AND (BCS_PART_STATUS.BCS_PART_STATUS_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_STATUS) AND (SUBSTR(OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, 1, 10) = TAGMIS_CASELOAD_SECURITY('VQL10O', OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AND ((REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.LATEST_OWNERSHIP_RANK = 1) AND BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION = 'Complete' AND PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.DESCRIPTION IN ('Basic Custody Screening - Start') AND REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.PHYSICAL_LOCATION IN ('Bedford (HMP)'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT_ID, BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, RECEPTION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, IN_EDUCATION, EASY_READ_WRITE, LEARNING_DIFFICULTY, SPECIAL_SCHOOL, UNDERSTAND_ENGLISH_EASY, READ_ENGLISH_EASY, WRITE_ENGLISH_EASY, SPEAK_ENGLISH_EASY, MATHS_EASY, HELP_TO_WORK, WORKING_BEFORE_CUSTODY, HELP_KEEPING_JOB, WORK_PROGRAMME, S4_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED, S4MC, COUNTDISTINCT(MIS_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY ASSESSMENT_ID = V_MAX_ASSESSMENT_ID) AS V_S4_NOMS_NUMBER, SURNAME || ', ' || INITIALS AS V_OFFENDER_SURNAME, CASE WHEN IN_EDUCATION = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_IN_EDUCATION, CASE WHEN SPECIAL_SCHOOL = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_SPECIAL_SCHOOL, CASE WHEN UNDERSTAND_ENGLISH_EASY = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_UNDERSTAND_ENGLISH_EASY, CASE WHEN READ_ENGLISH_EASY = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_READ_ENGLISH_EASY, CASE WHEN WRITE_ENGLISH_EASY = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_WRITE_ENGLISH_EASY, CASE WHEN SPEAK_ENGLISH_EASY = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_SPEAK_ENGLISH_EASY, CASE WHEN HELP_TO_WORK = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_HELP_TO_WORK, CASE WHEN S4_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S4_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_S4_NOMS_NUMBER
field.display: B4.12 Were you working before you came to custody?
field.legacySql: =Count([MIS Sentence].[NOMS Number];Distinct) Where ([Assessment ID] = [v_Max Assessment ID])

field.name: $ref:V_S4_NOMS_NUMBER
field.legacySql: =Count([MIS Sentence].[NOMS Number];Distinct) Where ([Assessment ID] = [v_Max Assessment ID])

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_MAX_ASSESSMENT_ID_FOR_FILTER IN (1))

field.name: $ref:V_S4_IN_EDUCATION
field.display:
B4.1 Before coming to prison were you in: 
1) Education, or 
2) Apprenticeship or traineeship?

field.name: $ref:V_S4_EASY_READ_WRITE
field.display: B4.3 Do you find it easy to read and write?

field.name: $ref:V_S4_LEARNING_DIFFICULTY
field.display: B4.4 Have you got a learning difficulty or disability?

field.name: $ref:V_S4_SPECIAL_SCHOOL
field.display: B4.5 Have you attended a special school?

field.name: $ref:V_S4_UNDERSTAND_ENGLISH_EASY
field.display: B4.6 Do you find understanding English easy?

field.name: $ref:V_S4_READ_ENGLISH_EASY
field.display: B4.7 Do you find reading English easy?

field.name: $ref:V_S4_WRITE_ENGLISH_EASY
field.display: B4.8 Do you find writing English easy?

field.name: $ref:V_S4_SPEAK_ENGLISH_EASY
field.display: B4.9 Do you find speaking English easy?

field.name: $ref:V_S4_MATHS_EASY
field.display: B4.10 Do you find maths easy?

field.name: $ref:V_S4_HELP_TO_WORK
field.display: B4.11 Do you feel you need any help to make you able to work?

field.name: $ref:V_S4_HELP_KEEPING_JOB
field.display: B4.13 Do you need help to keep your job while in prison? - This field is only available if the answer to question B4.12 is ‘Employed’
field.legacySql: =If([Help Keeping Job]=0;"No";(If([Help Keeping Job]=1;"Yes";(If([Help Keeping Job]=2;"Don't Know";"Not Answered")))))

field.name: $ref:V_S4_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED
field.display:
B4.15 Is ETE an issue which needs addressing? 
[For the screener to consider]
